snippet: Michelle Obama said a new book's portrayal of her exasperation with the White House staff was an imaginary portrait of "some angry black woman."
abstract: Michelle Obama said a new book's portrayal of her exasperation with the White House staff was an imaginary portrait of "some angry black woman."

headline.main: First Lady Brushes Off Book's Portrayal
headline.print_headline: First Lady Brushes Aside Book’s Account of Friction
